articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Mongolian President
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj on a visit to the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by the Mongolian president on Thursday.

articles.title: Mongolian President Leaves
articles.content:
Mongolian President Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj and his party left here by a special plane on Thursday after visiting the DPRK at the invitation of Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					 They were seen off at the airport by Kim Yong Nam, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister, Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, O Kum Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Son Kwang Ho, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Kwak Il Ryong, vice-minister of Land and Maritime Transport, Hong Kyu, DPRK ambassador to Mongolia, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is also chairman of the DPRK-Mongolia Friendship Association,  officials concerned and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here.
					
					 When the Mongolian president and his party arrived at the airport, children of the Mongolian embassy presented bouquets to him and his wife.
					
					 The Mongolian president exchanged farewells with the officials.

articles.title: Mongolian President Visits Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Mongolian President Visits Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj and his party visited Kim Il Sung University on Thursday.
					 They laid a bunch of flowers before the statue of leader Kim Jong Il on the campus and paid tribute to him.
					
					 The president made an address before teachers and students of the university.
					
					 He said he was pleased to visit the university and referred to the politics, economy, history, culture and foreign policy of Mongolia.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung visited Mongolia two times, he said, adding that the relations between the two countries have a long history and tradition. He expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries associated with the wisdom and efforts of the leaders of the elder generation would grow stronger.

articles.title: Mongolian President Visits Munsu Water Park
articles.content:
Mongolian President Visits Munsu Water Park
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Mongolian President Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj and his party visited the Munsu Water Park here on Thursday.
					 The guests went round the indoor wading pool, being briefed on the fact that the park was built as a comprehensive leisure place on the picturesque bank of the Taedong River.
					
					 They watched a women's volleyball match between the April 25 Sports Team of the DPRK and the Enacoree Sports Team of Mongolia.
					
					 Some members of the president's party visited the Mirim Riding Club on the same day.
					
					 The president and his party visited the Mansudae Art Studio on Wednesday.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. State Secretary's Invectives against DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Blasts U.S. State Secretary's Invectives against DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Thursday as regards a coarse remark made by U.S. State Secretary Kerry against the DPRK:
					 On October 28, Kerry, far from reflecting on the U.S. crime of persistently standing in the way of resuming the six-party talks, called the DPRK a "rogue state", a serious politically-motivated provocation reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. diplomatic chief insulted the DPRK, a dignified independent and sovereign state, fully revealing again the U.S. deep-running hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 Washington is inflaming bitterness toward the DPRK even by putting forward the State secretary and other diplomatic authorities while steadily escalating military threats to the DPRK. This shows that the U.S. has no intent to hold dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. set brigandish demands unacceptable to the DPRK as preconditions for the six-party talks, a crafty trick to check the resumption of the talks and evade the responsibility.
					
					 The true aim sought by the U.S. is to leave the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula unresolved and use it as a pretext for arms buildup pursuant to its return to the new Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 Consistent is the stand of the DPRK to denuclearize the Korean Peninsula but as the DPRK is exposed to the constant nuclear threat of the U.S. and the U.S. gets ever-more undisguised in its hostile moves against the DPRK, while reneging on its commitments, the DPRK will be left with no other option but to bolster its nuclear deterrence, unbound to anything.
					
					 As the DPRK has consistently insisted, the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula will be impossible unless the U.S. rolls back its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Unless Washington proves in action its intent to withdraw the hostile policy, a root cause of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, the DPRK will never unilaterally move first for the resumption of the talks.
					
					 In case the old U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK leads to the escalation of tension, the U.S. will be held entirely accountable for it.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Moves to Establish MD Slammed
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Moves to Establish MD Slammed 
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea issued the following statement on Thursday:
					 Recently the south Korean puppet group has zealously joined the U.S. in its moves to establish the missile defense system under the pretext of building the "south Korean-style MD", sparking off great concern and caution at home and abroad.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, at a recent state inspection at the "National Assembly" blustered that south Korea would establish multi interceptor system to cope with the missile attack of the DPRK. Kim Jang Su, chief of the security office of Chongwadae, during his tour of the U.S., asserted that it is natural that the "south Korean-style MD" is interlocked with the U.S. MD, hinting at the possible introduction of THAAD, the core interceptor system of the U.S. MD.
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean puppet group is contemplating purchasing more than a hundred Patriot missiles and relevant equipment and spare parts from the U.S. It is also blaring that south Korea will set up the ballistic guided-missile operation control station till the first half of the next year in a bid to interlock it with the U.S. theater missile defense operation control station.
					
					 It is an open secret that the group has joined the U.S. in its moves to build the MD while introducing AWACS, new-type radar, naval interceptor missile, ground interceptor missile, etc. under the signboard of building the "south Korean-type MD" since the years of Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 By introducing THAAD, the group is in the process of fully joining the U.S. in its moves to build the MD. This is a very dangerous act of rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in Northeast Asia tense and sparking off missile arms race in this region.
					
					 As known to everybody, the U.S. MD has been strongly rebuffed from the outset as it is a product of the "Star Wars" initiative in the 1980s pursuant to the scenario of a nuclear war to realize the U.S. strategy for world domination.
					
					 However, the U.S. has desperately pushed ahead with the building of the missile shield for aggression under the pretext of "defending" its mainland.
					
					 Recently it is keen on building MD by plugging in it even its satellite forces in a bid to attain its aggressive aims against the DPRK and other countries in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The puppet forces' zealously joining in the U.S. dangerous moves for a war of aggression brings into bolder relief their true colors as the U.S. war servants and special-class stooges.
					
					 Recently the group adopted together with its U.S. master the "tailored deterrence strategy" calling for mounting a preemptive strike at the DPRK, a sinister ploy to join the U.S. in its moves for building MD for aggression.
					
					 When public at home and abroad is becoming increasingly critical of the group's move, it is insisting that south Korea is not joining the U.S. in its moves to build MD. But it is nothing but sophism to cover up its real intention.
					
					 To introduce core interceptor equipment of the U.S. MD and interlock them with it means a total involvement in it.
					
					 Such move of the group will lead to spending more money collected from the south Korean people as taxes for the moves for a war of aggression, throwing their living into dire destitution and making south Korea increasingly dependent on the U.S. politically and militarily.
					
					 The moves stepped up by the U.S. to build a missile shield by drawing the group into it only render the situation on the Korean Peninsula and in its vicinity extremely tense and increase the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The prevailing situation clearly proves that the group is the arch criminal wrecking peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the region and escalating tensions, pursuant to the U.S. policy.
					
					 The group's joining the U.S. in its moves to build MD is as foolish an act as inviting a nuclear disaster.
					
					 If the group does not want self-destruction, it should stop at once its reckless move.
					
					 The south Korean people and other Koreans and the world peace-loving people should resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S. and the group to build MD.

articles.title: Cabinet Gives Banquet for Successful Weightlifters
articles.content:
Cabinet Gives Banquet for Successful Weightlifters 
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Cabinet of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Wednesday gave a banquet at Okryu Restaurant for the players who won medals in the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship.
					 Present at the banquet were Mun Kyong Dok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is concurrently chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Ri Jong Mu, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Colonel General of the Korean People's Army O Kum Chol, officials concerned, weightlifters and coaches.
					
					 Kim Yong Jin addressing the banquet offered congratulations to Om Yun Chol and Kim Un Guk who gave pleasure to supreme leader Kim Jong Un by winning gold medals in the championship and displayed the honor and dignity of Songun Korea.
					
					 He said that their achievements were attributable to the wise leadership and loving care of Kim Jong Un who exerted great efforts to make the country rank among the sports powers as soon as possible true to the behest of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He called upon all the sportsmen to glorify the honor of the country by winning gold medals in international matches through intensive training to get them prepared physically and in technique, bearing in mind the loving care and trust of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Om Yun Chol in his reply extended the best glory and thanks to Kim Jong Un in reflection of the loyalty and gratitude of all sportspersons.
					
					 He said he was greatly excited to look up at the DPRK flag being hoisted amid the playing of the national anthem. 
					
					 He renewed his pledge to conduct intensive training and win the international matches and thus uphold the will of Kim Jong Un to build a sports power.

articles.title: Participants in KPA Meeting Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in KPA Meeting Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th meeting of the company commanders and political instructors of the Korean People's Army (KPA) visited the Revolutionary Museum of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces here.
					 They laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing in the premises of the ministry and paid tribute to them.
					
					 At the museum which comprehensively deals with the glorious history of the revolutionary armed forces of Korea, they went round historic relics and data on the undying leadership feats of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 They also visited the Monument to Party Founding and the Tower of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Sports Contest of Artistes Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Sports Contest of Artistes Held in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The 44th sports contest of artistes took place at Kim Il Sung Stadium on Thursday.
					 The contest was divided into film, stage, fine art and art education sectors. It involved football, basketball, volleyball, group forced march, tug of war, Korean wrestling and other events.
					
					 The players displayed sports technique and collective spirit they have trained in the dynamic mass sports activities in leisure hours from the creation of literary and art pieces and education.
					
					 Ball games were a series of fierce see-saw battles with diverse servings, strong shots and long-distance throw-ins.
					
					 Spectacular were those who enthusiastically cheered their players, presenting dance, blowing brass band and showing acrobatics.
					
					 Whenever players displayed high sporting spirit, physical ability and refined skills, the spectators enthusiastically applauded them.
					
					 The contest culminated in the football final between the teams of the film and fine art sectors. 
					
					 The art education sector placed first in team standing.

articles.title: Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Daily Necessities Industry Held
articles.content:
Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Daily Necessities Industry Held
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of daily necessities industry took place here on Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, postgraduate students and officials in the field of daily necessities industry.
					
					 Presented to the event were valuable papers conducive to actively introducing cutting-edge science and technology into the production of daily necessities and improving the quality of goods.
					
					 Drawing attention of the participants were achievements made in improving the quality of sundry goods and data on updating production processes.
					
					 Appreciated there were papers of the Taedonggang Ironware Factory, Pyongyang Plastic School Things and Essential Goods Factory, Pyongyang School Things Factory and the Pyongyang Mechanical Pencil Factory and the achievements made by the Aromatic and Cosmetic Engineering Research Institute, Ponghwa Soap Factory and the Songyo Ceramic Factory.
					
					 The participants swapped experience, going round modern production processes of the Raknang Disabled Soldiers' Essential Plastic Goods Factory.

articles.title: DPRK, Chinese Girls Have Friendly Soccer Match
articles.content:
DPRK, Chinese Girls Have Friendly Soccer Match
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A U-14 women's friendly match between the Chobyong Sports Team of the DPRK and the Chinese team took place here on Thursday.
					 The DPRK team won the match 2:1.
					
					 The Chinese team will have another friendly match on November 2.

articles.title: Unha Garment Factory
articles.content:
Unha Garment Factory
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Unha Garment Factory in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province, run by family members of servicepersons, is well known in the DPRK as one of the model light industry factories.
					 The factory has fulfilled its annual quotas on all indices, while raising the industrial output value thrice than 10 years before.
					
					 This year it has finished its quota three months earlier than scheduled by displaying the spirit of "speed on Masik Pass" in hearty response to the tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 After completing the construction of the new main production building by itself, the factory introduced several hundred pieces of new equipment, thus laying a solid material and technical foundation. Old buildings and cultural and welfare establishments in the factory were also renovated to give face-lifting to it.
					
					 Through the mass technological innovation movement, software for embroidery and technical process were developed and a hundred and scores of technological innovations applied to the production together with efficient and rational methods of work, so as to boost the production.
					
					 All those successes achieved by the factory led it to winning the title of the Twice Three-Revolution Red Flag and the Twice "Lathe No.26" Model Machine Factory Prize.
					
					 Manager of the factory Pak Mi Sul, when interviewed by KCNA, said:
					
					 "We will work hard to produce more goods competitive in world markets by putting the production process and management activities on a modern and scientific basis."
					
					 Some days ago, the factory celebrated its diamond jubilee.

articles.title: Elephant-shaped Rock, DPRK's Natural Monument
articles.content:
Elephant-shaped Rock, DPRK's Natural Monument
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- On Pidan Island in Sindo County, North Phyongan Province, the DPRK, there stands a rock associable with a gigantic elephant, which was listed as one of natural monuments of the country.
					 The rock is 46 meters long, 15 meters high, 8 meters wide in its upper part, while the "proboscis of the elephant" is as round as 9 meters.
					
					 The rock was a small islet formed by ground subsidence in the area of the West Sea of Korea in the period from the late 3rd century to the early 4th century. 
					
					 Abrasion and weathering turned the islet to be the present-day rock.
					
					 The rock has "ivory" and a small hole on the middle of "proboscis".
					
					 When the rock is flooded by high tide, it looks like an elephant swimming in the sea.

articles.title: Legends about Mt. Kumgang (1)
articles.content:
Legends about Mt. Kumgang (1)
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The world-famous Mt. Kumgang in the DPRK boasts of a number of legends well known among the local people.
					 One of them tells about eight fairies of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 One day a young man came to save a deer from the chase of a hunter, when he was gathering firewood in Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 In order to repay his favor, the deer let him know the day when the fairies used to take a bath in the eight ponds of the mountain, and told him to hide away a celestial robe of one of the eight fairies.
					
					 The day came. He did as told by the deer when the fairies were taking a bath.
					
					 The fairy who lost her robe could not fly back to heaven but left in the mountain.
					
					 Later, she married the young man and enjoyed a happy life together with him.
					
					 One day years later, the man told his wife about her robe.
					
					 Getting her robe back, the fairy was so sick for her parents and sisters as to fly back to heaven with her children.
					
					 Later, the deer helped the man go up to heaven to reunite with his family. But they could not put Mt. Kumgang out of their minds, so that they descended again to the mountain.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Preaches Her Master's Doctrine for Aggression: News Analyst
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Preaches Her Master's Doctrine for Aggression: News Analyst
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- "Confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" touted by Park Geun Hye, puppet chief executive of south Korea, is a scenario for confrontation with fellow countrymen worked out by her master and his doctrine for aggression.
					 The U.S. is trying to woo the south Korean puppet government to apply to the Korean Peninsula the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" based on the "Helsinki process" which led socialist countries to collapse.
					
					 Park is reported to never miss the chance to utter the word "process", a revelation of her true colors as a traitor. Her "policy toward the north" is no more than a lever for carrying out the U.S. Asia strategy for aggression and Korea policy.
					
					 Park visited the U.S. in May this year and got a final approval of her "stand toward the north" from her master.
					
					 After directing the strategic pivot to the Asia-Pacific region to dominate the world, the U.S. crafted the "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" and let the pro-U.S. conservative forces in south Korea put it up in order to put the whole peninsula and Northeast Asia under its control.
					
					 It is the aim of the Park group to disarm the DPRK and realize its ambition for invading the DPRK, pursuant to the U.S. scenario.
					
					 Right after she came to power, Park said that the north's dismantlement of its nukes is not a precondition for mending the inter-Korean relations and that it is imperative to settle the relations between fellow countrymen primarily by preferentially pushing forward confidence-building and dialogue. She is now resorting to the theory of confrontation that there can be no dialogue and mending of relations with fellow countrymen armed with nukes.
					
					 Park declared that the confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula can be properly promoted only when the north dismantles its nukes, claiming that "nukes of the north can never be tolerated" and "the line of pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force simultaneously is a sheer illusion" whenever an opportunity presented itself. She is also begging for international cooperation, crying out for "north's dismantlement of its nukes" during her foreign junkets.
					
					 The bosses of Chongwadae, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Ministry of Unification are asserting that the said process is aimed to denuclearize the north and regards north's denuclearization as a primary objective. This is what the U.S. seeks.  The said process is a product of the master and his servant's real intention to attain their aim for aggression by disarming the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war has reached its height on the Korean Peninsula since the emergence of the Park regime, which adopted the process as a policy.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korea adopted the "tailored deterrence strategy" aimed to mount a preemptive strike at the DPRK even with nuclear armed forces in the U.S. mainland involved and the south Korean puppet forces are fully joining the U.S. in its moves to establish the missile defense system.
					
					 Distrust between fellow countrymen is festering and tensions are running high due to the confrontation and war moves of the south Korean conservative group aligned with foreign forces.
					
					 The "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" will bring nothing but a disaster to the nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Peace 
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula has been reeked with the powder fumes of ceaseless war maneuvers of the hostile forces in October. The prevailing situation again teaches the truth that genuine peace and security would be unthinkable as long as the imperialists exist on the earth.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 This month the U.S. authorities aligned with the south Korean puppet forces in urging the nuclear dismantlement of the DPRK, not content with staging military maneuvers on the peninsula, which is harassed with the mounting danger of war due to the acute political and military stand-off.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime already mapped out the "tailored deterrence strategy", an undisguised nuclear war conspiracy for putting the strategy of a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK into practice.
					
					 This shows that "non-aggression" and "the north's action first" touted by them are just a veil for covering up their attempt to invade the north.
					
					 War and peace cannot go together.
					
					 In actuality, continued anti-DPRK war rackets will entail a vicious cycle of distrust and confrontation and finally bring about a war.
					
					 As the DPRK stands firm by dint of powerful war deterrence against the U.S., which dreams of dominating the world, peace on the Korean Peninsula is being defended.
					
					 The situation eloquently proves that peace is guaranteed by arms.

articles.title: Action for Defending Jaju Minbo Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Defending Jaju Minbo Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Committee for Checking the Shutdown of Jaju Minbo of south Korea issued a resolution on October 28 calling for turning out in the actions to protect the progressive media.
					 The resolution recalled that Jaju Minbo has conducted information activities for national reconciliation, unity and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The conservative group is trying to shut down Jaju Minbo because its progressive information activities incurred the group's displeasure, it said.
					
					 If this land is dominated only by the assertions and theories of the conservative ruling party, it is quite impossible to realize the desire for independence, democracy and peaceful reunification, it noted.
					
					 We cannot remain a passive onlooker to the moves to close Jaju Minbo, it said, adding we will turn out in the campaign to defend the progressive media.
					
					 If the Seoul City Office files an administrative suit in the court to close Jaju Minbo, we will brand it as a servant of the heinous treacherous and anti-reunification conservative forces and launch a strong protest against it, the resolution stressed.
					
					 The real intention of the Park Geun Hye regime and the conservative forces is to obliterate the progressive forces, it said, calling upon the people of all social standings to fight against the frantic suppression.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Principle" Termed Theory of Confrontation
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Principle" Termed Theory of Confrontation 
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The inter-Korean relations now at a deadlock are an inevitable result of the anti-reunification moves of the south Korean puppet group which misused dialogue for escalating confrontation while crying out for maintaining the anachronistic "theory of principle", says Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article.
					 The "theory of principle" was raised by traitor Lee Myung Bak throughout his tenure of office only to be cursed and denounced by the whole nation. It was branded as the theory of confrontation which plunged the inter-Korean relations into a complete deadlock, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The present ruling forces of south Korea are doing huge damage to the inter-Korean relations, echoing the "maintenance of principle" called for by Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 No sooner had the present puppet chief executive taken office than she appointed die-hard confrontation maniacs bent on "cool-headed counteraction based on the principle" to the portfolios of the Ministry of Unification and other arms of the "government" handling the issue of inter-Korean relations.
					
					 She openly revealed her sinister intention to turn dialogue into a theatre for escalating confrontation, claiming that talks should be held on the "principle so far maintained by the south side" as regards the north-south dialogue and that the "theory of principle be abided by in approaching the north".
					
					 Slandering fellow countrymen even abroad, the south Korean puppet regime cried out for "halting the evil cycle of negotiations and aid" following "threat and provocation", contending that it is its consistent "principle toward the north".
					
					 The atmosphere for inter-Korean dialogue that was created by the DPRK's positive efforts was vitiated and the danger of war has increased. This is attributable to the moves of the puppet group for maintaining the "theory of principle."
					
					 All facts clearly prove that the "theory" is the intolerable theory of confrontation aimed at blocking inter-Korean dialogue and cooperation, fostering distrust and hostility and increasing the danger of a nuclear war.

articles.title: S. Korean Hospital's Illegal Act Criticized
articles.content:
S. Korean Hospital's Illegal Act Criticized
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- A branch of Seoul National University Hospital of the Medical Solidarity of the Public Transport Trade Unions of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on October 28 denouncing the university hospital management for using the hospital as a means for money-making.
					 At the press conference, the speakers accused the hospital of resorting to illegal acts.
					
					 The strike of the trade union of the hospital that has continued from Oct. 23 onwards is an expression of protest, they held.
					
					 They demanded a thorough-going investigation into the hospital.

articles.title: Tuition Waiver Program for Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
articles.content:
Tuition Waiver Program for Korean Schools Demanded in Japan
 Tokyo, October 30 (KNS-KCNA) -- Students of Korea University of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) staged a demonstration outside the building of the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on October 25, demanding the tuition-free program for Korean schools.
					 They condemned the Japanese government for excluding Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					
					 They vowed to continue actions until the program is applied to Korean schools.
					
					 The participants reflected their firm will, shouting a slogan calling for defending Korean schools and singing songs.
					
					 Mothers of students joined their children in the action.

articles.title: National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Nigeria
articles.content:
National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Abuja on October 25.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria who is chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the national committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to praise and widely introduce the brilliant revolutionary life and immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Benin
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Benin
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Cotonou on October 22.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to widely introduce the undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Efforts for Cause of Global Independence Praised by Beninese Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Efforts for Cause of Global Independence Praised by Beninese Figure
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- Generalissimo Kim Jong Il made immortal contributions to achieving the cause of global independence and advancing the socialist movement.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said this in the inaugural ceremony of the committee of the party for remembering Kim Jong Il held in Cotonou on October 22.
					
					 He said socialist Korea fully demonstrated its might to the world thanks to the rare wisdom, outstanding leadership and iron will possessed by Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The Korean people are now carving out their destiny with national pride and self-esteem, he noted, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il held high the banner of independence and socialism, illustrating the way ahead of the progressive humankind.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Peruvian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, October 31 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public a statement on Oct. 26 in support of the statement released by the spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on Oct. 23 to denounce the U.S. for again rendering the situation on the Korean Peninsula tense and escalating confrontation with the DPRK.
					 Accusing the U.S. of wantonly violating all the agreements for the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula and becoming all the more desperate in its moves to provoke a nuclear war against the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula is not a unilateral obligation to be complied by the DPRK only. It is the denuclearization of the whole peninsula, the elimination of the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK to be specific.
					
					 The U.S. has forced the DPRK to dismantle its nukes first, an act aimed to bring it into submission through nuclear superiority. This is nothing but a total denial of the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 Action for action is the basic principle to be maintained in settling the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 We fully support the statement of the spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry and strongly denounce the U.S. nuclear blackmail and threat to the DPRK and war moves against it.
					
					 The DPRK will dynamically advance toward the final victory along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con constructores militares de unidad 267 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con constructores militares de unidad 267 del EPC
						
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, tomo una fotografia de recuerdo junto a los constructores militares de la unidad 267 del EPC quienes realizaron meritos laborales en levantar las creaciones monumentales de la epoca del Songun.
					En el area de filmacion, el felicito a los reunidos que pusieron de pleno manifiesto el temperamento combativo y el espiritu de materializacion a ultranza de la unidad vanguardia y la heroica en los campos de construccion del socialismo como defensores de la patria y creadores de la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					En el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, las viviendas para los educadores de la Universidad Kim Il Sung, el Complejo de Piscinas de Recreacion de Munsu, el Club de Equitacion de Mirim y otras muchas obras monumentales estan registradas las huellas de abnegacion patriotica y esfuerzos valiosos de los oficiales y soldados de esta unidad, elogio asi los exitos logrados por ellos y se retrato con estos.
					
					Al final, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que en el futuro tambien, los comandantes y constructores militares de la unidad 267 cumpliran con su papel de precursor en los nuevos campos de construccion de un Estado prospero a los que les llamara el partido.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza disparate anti-RPDC de Kerry
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza disparate anti-RPDC de Kerry
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que el secretario de Estado norteamericano calumnio absurdamente a la  Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio este jueves a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 28, partiendo de la logica de bandido, el secretario de Estado norteamericano cometio la grave provocacion politica de calumniar a la RPDC, en lugar de reflexionar en su acto criminal de obstruir obstinadamente la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.
					
					Kerry, representante de la diplomacia norteamericana, ofendio a la RPDC, digno Estado independiente y soberano, como "Estado bribon", lo cual demostro otra vez la extremada hostilidad de EE.UU a ella.
					
					Mediante los discursos anti-RPDC de las autoridades diplomaticas como el secretario de Estado, EE.UU. fomenta la hostilidad a la RPDC elevando por otra parte el grado de amenaza militar. Esta realidad comprueba que ellas no quieren dialogar con la RPDC desde el principio.
					
					EE.UU. mantiene sus bandidescas demandas nunca aceptables para la RPDC como condiciones de la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, lo cual es una artimana para impedirla y eludir la responsabilidad.
					
					La intencion verdadera de EE.UU. es dejar pendiente el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana para usarlo como pretexto del aumento de las fuerzas armadas acorde con su nueva estrategia de retorno a Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de desnuclearizar la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Pero, mientras EE.UU. amenaza constantemente con armas nucleares a la RPDC y comete actos hostiles cada vez mas abiertos incumpliendo sus compromisos, la segunda se vera obligada a fortalecer aun mas su disuasivo nuclear sin comprometerse a nada.
					
					Como la RPDC demanda invariablemente, antes de que fuera cancelada la politica hostil de EE.UU. contra ella, nunca sera posible la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si EE.UU. no comprueba con acciones su voluntad de anular la politica hostil, causa del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana, no habra ni en sueno el caso de que la RPDC se mueva primera y unilateralmente para la reanudacion de las conversaciones referidas.
					
					Si se agrava el estado de tension debido a la invariable politica hostil anti-RPDC, la responsabilidad recaera totalmente sobre EE.UU.

articles.title: CNCDP denuncia establecimiento de sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CNCDP denuncia establecimiento de sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 31 la siguiente declaracion:
					En estos dias, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos toma activa parte en el sistema antimisiles de Estados Unidos so pretexto de establecer el "sistema antimisiles al estilo surcoreano", lo que causa gran preocupacion y precaucion del interior y el exterior.
					
					Hace poco, el ministro titere de Defensa Kim Kwan Jin, en la inspeccion parlamentaria respecto al gobierno, abogo por establecer el sistema de interceptacion de diferentes alturas frente al ataque de misiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. En tanto, durante su viaje a EE.UU., el jefe del gabinete de seguridad de Chongwadae, Kim Jang Su, insinuo la posibilidad de introducir el "THAAD", nucleo del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU., dijo que es justo el funcionamiento  simultaneo del sistema surcoreano junto con el sistema estadounidense.
					
					Por otra parte, los titeres tratan de comprar de EE.UU. ciento y decenas de misiles "Patriot", equipos relacionados y sus anexos y dicen que  estableceran hasta el primer semestre del ano siguiente una oficina de control de operacion de los proyectiles teledirigidos balisticos y la pondran en funcionamiento simultaneo junto con la oficina de control de operacion de defensa antimisil de EE.UU.
					
					Desde el "poder" de Lee Myung Bak, los titeres surcoreanos se incorporaron al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. introduciendo bajo el pretexto del "establecimiento del sistema antimisiles al estilo surcoreano", AWACS, radar de nuevo tipo, misiles interceptores en el  mar y la tierra.
					
					Ahora, los titeres surcoreanos tratan de introducir  hasta el "THAAD", de manera que toma activa parte en el sistema antimisiles de EE.UU.
					
					Esto es un acto peligrosisimo que agudiza la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y la region del Noreste Asiatico y provoca en esta la carrera armamentista.
					
					Como saben todos, el sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. fue trazado en la decada de 1980 como el plan de "guerra de galaxias" segun el guion de la guerra nuclear para realizar la estrategia de heguemonia mundial, lo cual fue rechazada categoricamente desde el principio por el interior y el exterior.
					
					A pesar de esto, el imperio yanqui ha seguido recurriendo con frenesi al establecimiento de tal sistema bajo el pretexto de la "defensa" de su territorio propio.
					
					En estos dias, a fin de alcanzar la meta agresiva a la RPDC y la region del Noreste Asiatico, se enfrasca mas al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles en contubernio con las fuerzas seguidoras.
					
					La incorporacion activa de dicha banda titere a tales maniobras de EE.UU. demuestra fehacientemente su naturaleza de sirviente de guerra y lacayo de pesima calana de EE.UU.
					
					La reciente aprobacion de la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" con su amo norteamericano parte de la intencion de tomar parte en el agresivo sistema antimisiles de EE.UU.
					
					Ahora, al alzarse en el interior y el exterior las voces de denuncia, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos dice que "no toma parte en el sistema antimisiles de EE.UU", pero no pasa de ser una sofisteria para encubrir su naturaleza.
					
					A decir verdad, la intencion de introducir los equipos medulares de interceptacion del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. y de funcionarlos simultaneamente significa la incorporacion total a dicho sistema.
					
					Debido a tales maniobras, malgastara el impuesto de los habitantes surcoreanos en la  guerra agresiva, se empeorara mas su vida y el Sur de Corea se quedara mas sometido en lo politico y militar a  la dominacion de EE.UU.
					
					El imperio yanqui recurre al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles junto con los titeres surcoreanos, debido a lo cual se torna mas tensa la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno y se agranda el peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					La situacion dada demuestra fehacientemente que la banda titere es el fautor principal que destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y agudiza la tension bajo el amparo de EE.UU.
					
					La incorporacion de los titeres al sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. es un acto absurdo que traiga una lluvia de fuego nuclear.
					
					Ellos deben poner inmediato fin a sus imprudentes actos si no quieren la autodestruccion.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana inclusive los habitantes surcoreanos y los pueblos del mundo amantes de la paz deben alzar las voces de denuncia a las maniobras de EE.UU. y los titeres de establecer el sistema antimisiles y frustrarlas rotundamente.

articles.title: Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de deportistas vencedores
articles.content:
Consejo de Ministros ofrece banquete en honor de deportistas vencedores
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio la vispera en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de los deportistas vencedores en el Campeonato Mundial de Levantamiento de Pesas 2013.
					Estuvieron presentes Mun Kyong Dok, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Deportes Ri Jong Mu, el coronel general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, O Kum Chol, los funcionarios de la rama correspondiente, jugadores y entrenadores.
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra, Kim Yong Jin felicito a los jugadores Om Yun Chol y Kim Un Guk quienes al ganar medallas de oro en el campeonato mundial, dieron placer al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y ostento a todo el mundo la dignidad y gallardia de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Subrayo que tal exito atribuyo a la sabia direccion y gran amor del Mariscal quien quiere poner cuanto antes nuestro pais en la posicion de la potencia deportiva en pleno acato al legado de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					Encomendo que sin olvidar el amor y confianza del Mariscal, todos los deportistas se preparen mejor en lo fisico y tecnico para ganar medallas de oro en juegos internacionales y glorificar asi el honor de la patria.
					
					En sus palabras de respuesta, el pesista Om rindio maxima gloria y agradecimiento al Mariscal en reflejo de la alta fidelidad y sentimiento de agradecimiento de los deportistas.
					
					Senalo que no pudo contener la emocion mirando la bandera nacional izandose en medio de la interpretacion del himno nacional.
					
					Expuso su firme decision de seguir ganando en los torneos internacionales al redoblar el fervor de entrenamiento de Paektu para apoyar con sus practicas el proyecto del Mariscal en materia de la construccion de la potencia deportiva.

articles.title: Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj visita Universidad Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj visita Universidad Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 31 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente de Mongolia Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj y su comitiva visitaron el dia 31 la Universidad Kim Il Sung.
					El presidente y su comitiva rindieron tributo al Dirigente Kim Jong Il luego de depositar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el plantel docente.
					
					El mandatario hizo uso de la palabra ante los profesores, empleados y estudiantes.
					
					Dijo que es muy alegre pronunciar un discurso en la universidad y se refirio a la politica, la economia, la historia, la cultura y la politica exterior de su pais.
					
					Senalo que el Presidente Kim Il Sung visito en dos veces su pais y subrayo que las relaciones de los dos paises tienen larga historia y la tradicion.
					
					Expreso su conviccion de que se ampliaran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad de ambos paises en las cuales estan impregnados los esfuerzos y trabajos de los lideres de la generacion veterana.
